segment.source: Release Notes for DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Release Notes for DaRT 8.0

segment.source: Release Notes for DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Release Notes for DaRT 8.0

segment.source: Release Notes for DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Release Notes for DaRT 8.0

segment.source: To search these release notes, press CTRL+F.
segment.target: To search these release notes, press CTRL+F.

segment.source: Read these release notes thoroughly before you install Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0.
segment.target: Read these release notes thoroughly before you install Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0.

segment.source: These release notes contain information that is required to successfully install DaRT 8.0.
segment.target: These release notes contain information that is required to successfully install DaRT 8.0.

segment.source: The release notes also contain information that is not available in the product documentation.
segment.target: The release notes also contain information that is not available in the product documentation.

segment.source: If there is a difference between these release notes and other DaRT documentation, the latest change should be considered authoritative.
segment.target: If there is a difference between these release notes and other DaRT documentation, the latest change should be considered authoritative.

segment.source: These release notes supersede the content that is included with this product.
segment.target: These release notes supersede the content that is included with this product.

segment.source: To get the DaRT software, see How to Get MDOP.
segment.target: To get the DaRT software, see How to Get MDOP.

segment.source: About the product documentation
segment.target: About the product documentation

segment.source: For information about documentation for DaRT, see the DaRT home page on Microsoft TechNet.
segment.target: For information about documentation for DaRT, see the DaRT home page on Microsoft TechNet.

segment.source: To obtain a downloadable copy of DaRT documentation, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=267420 on the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To obtain a downloadable copy of DaRT documentation, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=267420 on the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: Providing feedback
segment.target: Providing feedback

segment.source: We are interested in your feedback on DaRT 8.0.
segment.target: We are interested in your feedback on DaRT 8.0.

segment.source: You can send your feedback to mdopdocs@microsoft.com.
segment.target: You can send your feedback to mdopdocs@microsoft.com.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This email address is not a support channel, but your feedback will help us to plan future changes for our documentation and product releases.
segment.target: This email address is not a support channel, but your feedback will help us to plan future changes for our documentation and product releases.

segment.source: For the latest information about MDOP and additional learning resources, see the MDOP Information Experience page.
segment.target: For the latest information about MDOP and additional learning resources, see the MDOP Information Experience page.

segment.source: For more information about new updates or to provide feedback, follow us on Facebook or Twitter.
segment.target: For more information about new updates or to provide feedback, follow us on Facebook or Twitter.

segment.source: Known issues with DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Known issues with DaRT 8.0

segment.source: System restore fails when you run Locksmith or Registry Editor
segment.target: System restore fails when you run Locksmith or Registry Editor

segment.source: If you run Locksmith, Registry Editor, and possibly other tools, System Restore fails.
segment.target: If you run Locksmith, Registry Editor, and possibly other tools, System Restore fails.

segment.source: Workaround: Close and restart DaRT and then start System Restore.
segment.target: Workaround: Close and restart DaRT and then start System Restore.

segment.source: SFC scan fails to run after you launch and close Locksmith or Computer Management
segment.target: SFC scan fails to run after you launch and close Locksmith or Computer Management

segment.source: If you start and then close the Locksmith or Computer Management tools, System File Checker fails to run.
segment.target: If you start and then close the Locksmith or Computer Management tools, System File Checker fails to run.

segment.source: Workaround: Close and restart DaRT and then start SFC.
segment.target: Workaround: Close and restart DaRT and then start SFC.

segment.source: DaRT installer does not fail when ADK has not been installed
segment.target: DaRT installer does not fail when ADK has not been installed

segment.source: If you install DaRT 8.0 by using the command line to execute the MSI, and the ADK has not been installed, the DaRT installation should fail.
segment.target: If you install DaRT 8.0 by using the command line to execute the MSI, and the ADK has not been installed, the DaRT installation should fail.

segment.source: Currently, the DaRT 8.0 installer installs all components except the DaRT 8.0 recovery image.
segment.target: Currently, the DaRT 8.0 installer installs all components except the DaRT 8.0 recovery image.

segment.source: Workaround: None.
segment.target: Workaround: None.

segment.source: Defender cannot be launched after Locksmith, RegEdit, Crash Analyzer, and Computer Management are launched
segment.target: Defender cannot be launched after Locksmith, RegEdit, Crash Analyzer, and Computer Management are launched

segment.source: Defender does not launch if you have already launched Locksmith, RegEdit, Crash Analyzer, and Computer Management.
segment.target: Defender does not launch if you have already launched Locksmith, RegEdit, Crash Analyzer, and Computer Management.

segment.source: Workaround: Close and restart DaRT and then launch Defender.
segment.target: Workaround: Close and restart DaRT and then launch Defender.

segment.source: Defender may be slow to launch
segment.target: Defender may be slow to launch

segment.source: Defender sometimes takes a few minutes to launch.
segment.target: Defender sometimes takes a few minutes to launch.

segment.source: The progress bar indicates the current loading status.
segment.target: The progress bar indicates the current loading status.

segment.source: Workaround: None.
segment.target: Workaround: None.

segment.target: Release notes copyright information
